review_text: Battery easily lasts all day even with heavy use — very impressed.
Camera performs well in daylight but struggles a bit in low light; average overall.
Performance is snappy and responsive for everyday apps and multitasking.
Charging is inconsistent — sometimes it stalls at 40% and takes forever to resume.
Sleek design and premium feel, though it picks up fingerprints easily.
Display is bright with accurate colors, but the contrast seems off in some apps.
Camera captures great detail and is quick to focus most of the time.
Audio is crisp and clear for music and calls, pleasantly surprised.
Touchscreen occasionally misses taps and scrolling can be jittery.
Great for photography, but battery life is average — may need a top-up by evening.
Screen resolution is fantastic — videos look crisp and vibrant.
Performance is solid; no lag even with heavy apps and games.
Fingerprint sensor is hit-or-miss and sometimes refuses to recognize saved prints.
Battery optimization helps but I still get less than ideal screen-on time with heavy use.
Lightweight and sturdy — comfortable to hold for long periods.
High refresh rate makes scrolling and gaming feel incredibly smooth.
Plenty of storage; haven't run into space issues even with lots of apps.
Phone overheats during long gaming sessions and throttles performance.
Face unlock is quick and reliable in most lighting conditions.
Excellent value for money — feels like a much pricier phone.

Battery drains quickly when using navigation apps — disappointing endurance.
Colors on the OLED display are vibrant and lifelike.
Very reliable so far — no crashes or unexpected restarts.

Device randomly reboots a couple of times a week, pretty frustrating.

Screen size strikes a good balance for productivity and media consumption.
Bluetooth keeps dropping when connected to my car stereo.
Exceeded expectations — smooth day-to-day performance and solid battery life.
Calls are clear most of the time, though sometimes the mic sounds distant.
Dependable for daily use; haven't experienced major issues.
Security updates are infrequent and I had to wait a long time for a patch.
Premium feel and smooth glass back; worth the price for me.

Great for video calls — both audio and video are reliable.
Charging sometimes stalls and the cable connection feels loose.
Outstanding performance for heavy multitasking and content creation.
Good overall, but I wish the manufacturer offered more bundled storage options.

After a month, small scratches appeared on the screen despite careful use.

Ample storage for apps and media, hasn't been an issue.
Auto-brightness oscillates and is distracting in mixed lighting.

Good mix of style and function — many of my friends asked about it.

Performance is good, but the phone feels warm after extended use.
Excellent battery backup — really handy when traveling.
Display flickers occasionally and requires a reboot to fix.

Robust performance across apps; hasn't slowed down since day one.

Fast and fluid performance day-to-day; very reliable.

Definitely recommended — been using it daily without regrets.

Runs smoothly with no overheating — reliable performance for daily tasks.
Excellent phone — feels worth the price and performs consistently.
